import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../styles/Navbar.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = (props) => { const [active, setActive] = useState("nav__menu"); const [toggleIcon, setToggleIcon] = useState("nav__toggler"); const loggedInUser = props.user.username; const navToggle = () => { active === "nav__menu" ? setActive("nav__menu nav__active") : setActive("nav__menu"); toggleIcon === "nav__toggler" ? setToggleIcon("nav__toggler toggle") : setToggleIcon("nav__toggler"); }; if (!loggedInUser) { return ( <>
  • EasyChat
    • Home
    • About
    • Login
    • Register
    ); } else { return ( <>
  • EasyChat
    • Home
    • Hello {loggedInUser}!
    ); } }; export default Navbar;
